title: Le Defile de Poncarbo = the Gorges of Poncarbo
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Paul Feval.
description: Episode 5 of Series "Lagardere". Following his humiliation at the Regent's ball, Philippe de Gonzague flees the court, taking Flor and Aurore as hostages. On his way to Spain, Gonzague and his aides stop at an inn. There they plot to assassinate their pursuant with the help of local ruffians.  Credits: Producer, Robert Velin ; director, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; writers, Marcel Jullian, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; photography, Georges Barsky ; music, Jacques Loussier. Cast: Jean Piat, Jacques Dufilho, Jean-Pierre Darras, Nadine Alari, Jacques Balutin, Claude Confortes, Marco Perrin
